entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Hamilton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:55 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -2.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Hamilton Munro Int'l Airport 11:00 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: -2.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 64 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -7.9°C
Wind: SSW 22 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 after midnight. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 15 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Temperature steady near plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy late in the morning. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries or drizzle late in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 in the morning then diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 late in the afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
